title: Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" Lightweight Hardside Suitcase With Silent Spinner Wheels; Purple;  21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage; Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple; ABS hard shell, steel rod; Capacity: 33L; Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H); Weight: 5.62lb; 360 degree silent double spinner wheels
descriptions:
Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" - your ultimate travel companion! This stylish and lightweight hardside suitcase is designed to maximize your packing space while still fitting under the seat, making it perfect for 1-3 day trips.

Crafted from high-quality ABS hard shell material, this suitcase is not only durable and impact-resistant but also scratch-resistant, ensuring it maintains its sleek appearance even after numerous trips. The steel rod frame adds an extra layer of durability, making this luggage a long-lasting investment.

Available in a variety of vibrant colors including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple, you can choose the one that best suits your style. With a capacity of 33L, you'll have plenty of room for all your essentials.

Measuring 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H) and weighing just 5.62lb, this carry-on is incredibly lightweight, making it easy to lift and maneuver. The 360 degree silent double spinner wheels ensure smooth and quiet rolling in any direction, while the TSA lock provides added security and peace of mind.

The interior is thoughtfully designed with a full-capacity design, including a mesh zip pocket and elasticated compartments to keep your belongings organized and secure. The handle, made from soft TPR material, is adjustable for comfort and features a full TPR soft handle with a straight handle for easy carrying.

Experience the ultimate convenience and style with the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20". Travel smarter, not harder!
